title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Global Resilient Apps: Guide to Multi-AZ/Region Architecture with ELB (NET311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球弹性应用：ELB多可用区/多区域架构指南 (NET311)
abstract: Learn advanced techniques for building globally distributed, highly available applications using Elastic Load Balancing (ELB). Through demonstrations and real-world use cases, you will learn essential patterns for multi-Availability Zone configurations, multi-Region deployments, and comprehensive disaster recovery solutions. The session covers optimizing global application performance using ELB and Amazon Route 53 to create resilient, globally accessible applications. Gain practical insights into implementing robust architectures and learn best practices for scaling, monitoring, and managing these complex systems, equipping yourself with the knowledge to build and maintain world-class, fault-tolerant solutions.
abstract_cn: 学习使用弹性负载均衡（ELB）构建全球分布式、高可用应用程序的高级技术。通过演示和实际用例，您将学习多可用区配置、多区域部署和综合灾难恢复解决方案的基本模式。本课程涵盖使用ELB和Amazon Route 53优化全球应用程序性能，以创建具有弹性的全球可访问应用程序。获得实施稳健架构的实用见解，学习扩展、监控和管理这些复杂系统的最佳实践，为您提供构建和维护世界级容错解决方案的知识。
